item.title: WhatConverts: The Complete Guide to Lead Tracking & Marketing Attribution Software (Features, How It Works, Pricing & Who Should Use It).
item.description:
Marketing teams today face one major challenge: proving which campaigns actually generate revenue. WhatConverts solves this problem by giving businesses a single platform to track every lead—calls, forms, chats, and eCommerce events—and tie them back to the exact marketing source.

This guide breaks down how WhatConverts works, its core features, who it’s built for, and the most up‑to‑date pricing.

What Is WhatConverts?

WhatConverts is an all‑in‑one lead tracking, call tracking, and marketing attribution software that helps businesses understand:
